column7: 2015 at vidant roanoke chowan hospital. he was born in north hampton county on october 6
column8: 1931 to the late edgar and annie leggett dunning. mr. dunning was a minister with the north carolina pentecostal holiness conference for over 50 years
column9: serving churches in both martin and bertie counties. funeral services will be held saturday
column11: 2015 at 2:00 p. m. in williamston at first pentecostal holiness church. bishop jimmy whitfield and rev. roger leggett will be officiating the services. burial will follow at edgewood cemetery. he is survived by his wife
column13: william talmadge dunning and wife deborah b. of williamston
column18: diane pickett and husband stewart of orange
column26: and eleven great grandchildren. family will receive friends friday
column27: june 12th from 7-8:30 pm at walker funeral home and from the home at other times. walker funeral home in windsor is serving the dunning family. online condolences may be sent to www. walkerfh. netsend sympathy card print name location email personal message hide emailenter personal message here too difficult to read? reload. type the text in order submit guest book entry .
